Leading climate scientists conclude that new technology and other untested methods are needed to take greenhouse gases out of the atmosphere Andrews Christopher Joyce has details on the new report
The scientists were asked if it's possible to keep the planet from warming more than about two and a half degrees Fahrenheit above pre industrial temperatures that's a red line for dangerous effects on the climate
